title: Eliminates the use of income from pensions of New York state, local governments and the federal government from the calculation of income for the purposes of financial aid
summary: Eliminates the use of income from pensions of New York state, local governments and the federal government from the calculation of income for the purposes of financial aid.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to eliminating the use of certain pensions in the determination of the amount of student financial aid
